title: Wasn't Urfwick supposed to be in a BE shop?
body: Logged in and got him for free, already had him thought.  Did they scrap the shop entirely??

replies.body: No, it's still there. You already had him if you got him for free, that's my bet. On my client, he's a 150,000 BE.

OK, thanks fellows!

Actually, where do I find this shop thing?  Cause I though there were supposed to be other skins and stuff to buy??
if u had the old one, you get the new one also for free and a border for old one, according to riot.
